column2: the drive and price was worth it. I ordered the crunchy chicken sandwich with kale and potato salad. Like almost all the the reviewers have said
column3: the chicken sandwich is so goooooood. Chicken was moist and the pretzel bun was the best part for me. The bun was slightly sweet
column4: but it completed the sandwich. I'd say I have a pretty average appetite for a college girl
column5: and I was already full after half a sandwich. Potato salad was alright
column6: nothing super amazing to say about it. You can't really go wrong with potato salad
column7: can you? And order the kale! Delicious.
